author: Blake Schuster
title: Kentucky's John Calipari Talks NBA Draft, COVID-19 in Virtual At-Home Presser
description: Kentucky men's basketball head coach  John Calipari  didn't let social distancing stop him from holding a press conference Tuesday...
content:
Sam Craft/Associated Press
Kentucky men's basketball head coach John Calipari didn't let social distancing stop him from holding a press conference Tuesday. He held a virtual call to discuss the state of the program, the impact of the coronavirus on college … [+2754 chars]
